name: Dragons Together
description:
Help the dragons defeat the evil spirits. Each dragon is powerful against one type of spirit, but is weak against another type. You will have to guide the dragons to work together and protect each other's weak spots. 

You can only control one dragon at a time. To switch between different dragons use the 1, 2, or 3 keys as shown below.

Left click on a target (spirit or spirit spawn point) to lock on and attack it, or left click a point on the ground to send attacks at that point. Right click to move to that location. Hold down the right mouse button to have the active dragon follow the mouse.

When a spirit spawn point is destroyed, the dragon of that type will become more powerful in the following level. Be careful not to let all of your dragons die before the time is up.
